subject: Law
title: Right of Publicity
description: A fast breakdown of Right of Publicity for builders.

hook.text: A company uses a celebrity's face to sell products without permission. The celebrity suesâ€”and wins.

buildup.text: The right of publicity protects a person's name, image, and likeness from unauthorized commercial use.

discovery.text: It's a state-level right in the US. Some states offer strong protection; others have minimal laws.

twist.text: AI deepfakes raised new questions. Can someone create a fake video of you selling a product you never endorsed?

climax.text: Several states are passing laws specifically targeting AI-generated likenesses to fill this legal gap.

punchline.text: Your face is yours. No one should profit from it without asking.

quiz.question: What does the right of publicity protect?
options: A person's name, image, and likeness from commercial misuse
